title: Beginnings
description: THIS IS A SAMPLERIT IS NOT A PREQUEL NOR AN INTRODUCTION NOR A SEPARATE PART OF THE SERIES.IT DOESN'T CONTAIN ANY ORIGINAL MATERIAL - NOT A SINGLE LETTER.IT IS A TRAILER AND JUST LIKE A TRAILER OF "STAR WARS" IS NOT "STAR WARS - PART 0" THIS IS NOT "DARK TALES OF RANDAMOR THE RECLUSE - PART ZERO" or "PART 0.5"IT CONTAINS THE FIRST TWELVE CHAPTERS OF "PART 1: BONDS OF HATE"IT WAS A TEMPORARY PROMOTION GIMMICK AND HAS SINCE BEEN RETIRED.
author: Andrew Ashling
